name: Final Light Guardian
description:
Final Light : Guardian After the world event called the Big Light, a million of people were taken. This event have caused a world war. At the end only a few people stay alive under the ground. They developed a new kind of soldier to protect them. After 1000 years the world become unsafe, full of mutant créatures (mixed of biomecanical and artificial intelligence). You must survive in this new world, but  for how long?. Use your Army bot to defense the gate to your base.
  1. When you kill a Enemies  you earn money (Demo)
  2. You can use only one bot (Demo version)
  3. Only one kind of enemies no evolution
  4. Change Soldier Mode :Auto or Manual (Final Version)
    1. Automatic Mode is an upgrade 
  5. Use money to build new type of bots or update them (Final Version)
  6. Strategy part(Final Version): 
    1. Enter in the basement to manage the weapons production
    2. energy, bullet production, etc...
  8. Add Support Bot to your Soldier.(Final Version)
    1. Turrel
    2. Wall
    3. Mine
